name: Torn Sleeve
loreDescription: A torn sleeve out of which various weapons appear as though they are prosthetic limbs. She never has explained how she manages to fit so many things up there.

skillDescription.base: 50.0% chance to inflict bleed for 2 turns after a single attack.
skillDescription.max: 100.0% chance to inflict bleed for 2 turns after a single attack.
